com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.retrievalservice

Interface IExternalDataRetrievalService


  • public interface IExternalDataRetrievalService
    A pair of methods for retrieving live data from an external data provider in a data acquisition solution.

    The following rules determine whether and how Items are returned by the methods of IExternalDataRetrievalService:

    An Item is not returned when:

    • The Item does not exist.
    • The user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.NONE and a grant level of SecurityGrantLevel.NONE on the Item.
    • The Item has an ItemType that has the ProhibitedRetrieve indicator.
    • The Item is a Link with an end Entity on which the user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.NONE and a grant level of SecurityGrantLevel.NONE.
    • The Item is a Link with an end Entity whose ItemType has the ProhibitedRetrieve indicator.
    An Item is returned as an ItemPlaceholder when:
    • The user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.READ_CLOAKED on the Item.
    • The user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.NONE but a grant level of more than SecurityGrantLevel.NONE on the Item.
    An Item is returned as an Item when:
    • The Item exists, and the user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.READ_ONLY (or above) on the Item.
    Items and ItemPlaceholders will contain SecurityAccessPermissions and SecurityGrantPermissions if the user has a grant level of SecurityGrantLevel.UPDATE.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExternalDataResults getContext(List<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups, boolean includeRetrievalBlockMap, int maxNumberOfItems, boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyItems)
      Gets an ExternalDataResults that contains Items from an external data provider that are related to previously retrieved Items.
      ExternalDataResults getLatestItems(List<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups, boolean includeRetrievalBlockMap)
      Gets an ExternalDataResults that contains Items from an external data provider.

    • Method Detail

      • getLatestItems

        ExternalDataResults getLatestItems(List<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups,
                                   boolean includeRetrievalBlockMap)
                            throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                   ExternalDataSourceException
        Gets an ExternalDataResults that contains Items from an external data provider. The Item data in the provider is identified using information in the specified ProvenanceGroups.
        Parameters:
        provenanceGroups - The ProvenanceGroups that contain the information that this service will use to identify data in the external data provider.
        includeRetrievalBlockMap - true if the ItemGroups in the returned ExternalDataResults should contain information that connects the retrieved Items to the RetrievalBlocks that matched their data; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        See above.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid.
        ExternalDataSourceException - If an error occurs during processing of the external data.

      • getContext

        ExternalDataResults getContext(List<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups,
                               boolean includeRetrievalBlockMap,
                               int maxNumberOfItems,
                               boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyItems)
                        throws InvalidArgumentException,
                               TooManyItemsException,
                               TooManySeedsException,
                               ExternalDataSourceException
        Gets an ExternalDataResults that contains Items from an external data provider that are related to previously retrieved Items. The data for the previously retrieved Items is identified using information in the specified ProvenanceGroups.
        Parameters:
        provenanceGroups - The ProvenanceGroups that contain the information that this service will use to identify data in the external data provider.
        includeRetrievalBlockMap - true if the ItemGroups in the returned ExternalDataResults should contain information that connects the retrieved Items to the RetrievalBlocks that caused them to be retrieved; false otherwise.
        maxNumberOfItems - The maximum number of Items to be returned in the ExternalDataResults.
        shouldThrowIfTooManyItems - true to throw an exception (and return no results) when the number of Items to return exceeds maxNumberOfItems; false to throw no exception and return up to maxNumberOfItems results. If maxNumberOfItems is not exceeded, this parameter has no effect.
        Returns:
        See above.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid.
        ExternalDataSourceException - If an error occurs during processing of the external data.
        TooManySeedsException - If the specified ProvenanceGroups resolve to too many seed Items.
        TooManyItemsException - If the number of context Items to return is greater than maxNumberOfLinks, and shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks is true.
